project_plan.name: Python-Based Quiz Game
project_plan.description: Design a Python-based quiz game that asks the user multiple-choice questions, tracks the user's score, and displays it at the end of the game. Questions and answers will be stored in a variable within the code.

task.name: Create a variable to store questions and answers
Implement the quiz logic to ask questions and collect user responses
Calculate and keep track of the user's score throughout the quiz
Display the final score to the user at the end of the game
Write tests for the quiz logic and scoring functionality
Execute tests on the quiz game implementation to ensure it functions correctly
